title: banitem怎么只禁止合成?
author: s271591306
txt_content:
我想在服务器里做一些只能通过购买得到的物品，要禁止合成还得允许使用、放置、破坏，要怎么添加呢
看插件的设置文件里也没有craft的blacklist 自己加一个有用么？

replies.author: _CrazyNut_
replies.txt_content: http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-246277-1-6.html这个插件光禁止合成~超简单操作

replies.author: a62295521
replies.txt_content: ESS基础插件貌似做不到这一点。给你推荐个插件。http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-131739-1-8.html 这个可以做到只禁止合成，不禁止使用等。详情看原帖。

replies.author: jiuerd
replies.txt_content: essentials.build.break.<id>[:datavalue]Allows breaking of a block.破坏essentials.build.craft.<id>[:datavalue]Allows crafting of an item.合成essentials.build.drop.<id>[:datavalue]Allows dropping of an item.丢弃essentials.build.interact.<id>[:datavalue]Allows interacting with a blocks or item.互动essentials.build.pickup.<id>[:datavalue]Allows collecting of an item.拾取essentials.build.place.<id>[:datavalue]Allows placing a block.放置
